basics.label: Software Developer
basics.name: Joshua Brandt
basics.summary: Well rounded software developer with a background in software quality assurance, technical support, web hosting, and system administration.

work.summary: Maintain the internal business and billing software to support cPanel and its customers.
highlights: Integrated LiteSpeed into the web store.
Maintained and improved several systems in order to support our customers and employees.

work.summary: Ensured the quality of cPanel & WHM software was up to par with the expectations of both managers and product owners, as well as with the customer base.
highlights: Tested and approved many of the most used features in cPanel & WHM currently.
Helped develop and improve several automated functional tests utilizing Selenium.

work.summary: Provided top tier technical support to all of cPanel's customers.
highlights: Overall feedback score of over 9.5 out of 10.
Assisted with helping resolve issues for several high-profile customers.

work.summary: Provided in-house technical support, including general troubleshooting and customized solutions, for several clients in and around the Houston area.
highlights: Worked hand-in-hand with several high-profile clients to ensure they were running smoothly.
Often requested by name to help out several client locations as they had deemed my personality and customer service abilities to be a perfect fit for them.

work.summary: Monitored the network for signs of compromise, and cleaned and prevented any compromises as well as combated spam.
highlights: Tracked down and stopped many spam networks running on user accounts.
Stopped and cleaned up many compromised customer accounts to reduce phishing and increase overall security of our servers.

work.summary: Provided technical support for customers through live chat and telephone, as well as assisted anyone with sales questions.
highlights: Provided rapid and thorough technical support to customers.
Helped to educate customers in common issues and remedies so they would not have to waste money waiting on technical support to remedy common issues.

skills.name: General Programming
skills.level: Basic to Intermediate (see "Languages" for programming language details)

awards.title: ISTQB CTFL, CTAL-TA
awards.summary: International Software Testing Qualifications Board certifications Certified Tester Foundation Level and Certified Tester Advanced Level, Test Analyst

awards.title: Advanced Cardiac Life Support
awards.summary: Certifies that the holder is trained on advanced life-support, life-saving, intervention, and team dynamics and communication techniques

awards.title: International Trauma Life Support
awards.summary: Certifies that the holder is trained on managing out-of-hospital trauma situations to an international standard of care.

awards.title: Pediatric Advanced Life Support
awards.summary: Certifies that the holder is trained on advanced life-support techniques for pediatric patients.

awards.title: EMT-Basic
awards.awarder: National Registry of Emergency Medical Technicians
awards.summary: Certification for an EMT Basic level to enable a person to work as an EMT.
